title: Kadhal Vanthum Sollamal Lyrics Saravana
stanzas:
Kadhal vandhum sollaamal
nenjukulle yaengum ennai
kollaathe sollaamal sellaathey

Kadhal vandhum sollaamal
nenjukulle yaengum ennai
kolvaayo un kadhal solvaayo

idhayathile oru vali
imaigalile pala thuli
nee sendraal kooda
kadhal sugamaagum.
nee pirinthaal ulagam
urugum mezhugaagum

vaarthai ondrile
vazhkai thandhidu
boomi pandhaiye orey
sollil suthidu.

vidhiyin kaigalo
vaanam pondradhu
puriyum munname
manam saambal aaguthu.

ninaivu idari mannil
vilugirathe nizhalil
karaindhu adhu saagaathaa

kadhal kathari ingu
azhugirathe irandu
kannum adhil karugaathaa

yaenthaan kathal valarthen
adhai yaeno ennul puthaithaen
sudar illaatha theeyil
erigindren
sudum kanneeril kaditham
varaigindren

penne.. un paathaiyil
nagarum maramaaguven
oh ho oh
iravai thindru
vazhnthaai neeyadi
idhayam kondu
ponaal ennadi.

Kadhal vandhum sollaamal
nenjukulle yaengum ennai
kolvaayo un kadhal solvaayo

Kadhal vandhum sollaamal
nenjukulle yaengum ennai
kollaathe sollaamal sellaathey

Kadhal vandhum sollaamal
nenjukulle yaengum ennai
kolvaayo un kadhal solvaayo

idhayathile oru vali
imaigalile pala thuli
nee sendraal kooda
kadhal sugamaagum.
nee pirinthaal ulagam
urugum mezhugaagum

vaarthai ondrile
vazhkai thandhidu
boomi pandhaiye orey
sollil suthidu.

vidhiyin kaigalo
vaanam pondradhu
puriyum munname
manam saambal aaguthu.
